dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: 고래 싸움에 새우 등 터진다이/가 뭐예요?
dialogue.romanization: gorae ssaume saeu deung teojindai/ga mwoyeyo?
dialogue.translation: What is "고래 싸움에 새우 등 터진다"?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 고래 싸움에 새우 등 터진다은/는 caught between two fires(이)에요.
dialogue.romanization: gorae ssaume saeu deung teojindaeun/neun caught between two fires(i)eyo.
dialogue.translation: "고래 싸움에 새우 등 터진다" means "caught between two fires".
